snippet: The government has ordered an investigation into the cause of the accident, which occurred Saturday afternoon in northern Afghanistan.
abstract: Partial collapse of a coal mine in northern Afghanistan kills at least 20 coal miners and injures 14 others.

byline.original: By AZAM AHMED and SHARIFULLAH SAHAK

lead_paragraph: The government has ordered an investigation into the cause of the accident, which occurred Saturday afternoon in northern Afghanistan.

headline.main: Mine Collapse in Afghanistan Kills at Least 20
headline.print_headline: Mine Collapse in Afghanistan Kills at Least 20
